snippet: The brother of the four-time IndyCar champion Dario Franchitti is testing the DeltaWing, a radical racecar prototype that may find application in the Le Mans series.
abstract: The brother of the four-time IndyCar champion Dario Franchitti is testing the DeltaWing, a radical racecar prototype that may find application in the Le Mans series.

headline.main: A Fast Franchitti, but Not That One, Takes the Helm of the DeltaWing
